org.openmap4u.canvas

Interface SetAreaOfInterestOrDrawOrWriteable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DrawOrWriteable

    public interface SetAreaOfInterestOrDrawOrWriteable
extends DrawOrWriteable
    Allows either to set the area of interest and / or draw zero or more primitives and finally write the result.
    Author:
    Michael Hadrbolec
